options.None: have no graph in the viewport
options.Dropdown Menu: File -> Open File: lay out a network graph from the Excel, SIF, or GraphML network if there are no errors in the file
options.Dropdown Menu: Demo -> Demo #1: lay out an unweighted network graph from Demo #1
options.Dropdown Menu: Demo -> Demo #2: lay out a weighted network graph from Demo #2
options.Dropdown Menu: Demo -> Demo #3: lay out an unweighted network graph from Demo #3
options.Dropdown Menu: Demo -> Demo #4: lay out a weighted network graph from Demo #4

options.Select: center, zoom to 100%, and reapply the force graph parameters

options.Select \"To Unweighted SIF\": export an unweighted SIF file from the graph currently loaded
options.Select \"To Weighted SIF\": export a weighted SIF file from the graph currently loaded
options.Select \"To Unweighted GraphML\": export an unweighted GraphML file from the graph currently loaded
options.Select \"To Weighted GraphML\": export a weighted GraphML file from the graph currently loaded
options.Select \"To Unweighted Excel\": export an unweighted Excel file from the graph currently loaded
options.Select \"To Weighted Excel\": export a weighted Excel file from the graph currently loaded

options.Select \"To PNG\": export a PNG image from the graph currently loaded
options.Select \"To SVG\": export a SVG image from the graph currently loaded
options.Select \"To PDF\": export a PDF file from the graph currently loaded
